intro.title: EN_Bluewater Texas Terminal Deepwater Port Project
intro.description: EN_The purpose of this site is to inform stakeholders about the project, and to provide the public an opportunity to submit written comments.

projectDescription.title: EN_project description
projectDescription.description: EN_Bluewater is proposing to construct, own, operate, and the eventual decommission a deepwater port terminal in the Gulf of Mexico to export domestically produced crude oil. The proposed project involves the design, engineering, and construction of a deepwater port, approximately 56.18 statute miles of pipeline infrastructure.
